title: Western Music & Stingers Collection V1.5
description: A fist full of looping western music, stingers, and stems.
longDescription:
Update V1.5 Selected Samples: https://youtu.be/IgFV-CAwB-E

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ClZiFbvggC4&list=OLAK5uy_mXwU6M79EX7vGLbMLi983au06hw7Bx-Gg&index=1

Original Previews: https://soundcloud.com/voltzsupreme/sets/western

Dynamic Music Example: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wJxwn82wBcc


Turn up the heat with this fist full of western music by composer and voltage architect Voltz Supreme.

In true Spaghetti Western style, these looping tracks, stems and stingers will bring out the good, bad, and the ugly aspects of any wild west game. This collection also includes two dynamic music compositions which use the simple vertical stem method.


Please credit "Music by Voltz Supreme" when using this music in your project.


If there's enough interest and positive reviews, I'll continue to update this. So if you like this pack, please leave a review.


MUSIC:

1. The Big Title

2. Desert Eagle

3. Buffalo Stampede

4. Mystery at Sundown

5. The Horse With No Rider

6. We Wait

7. The Hunt - The Journey

8. The Hunt - The Thrill

9. The Hunt - The Terror

10. Chasing Victory

11. Chasing Victory II

12. In This Town

13. One Shot Jones

14. One Shot Jones II

15. Peyote Cowboy

16. The People of the Raven

17. For Victory and Honor

18. Alternative Country

19. Bullet Storm (4x versions)

20. Desert Hallucinations

21. Down In The Swamp (instrumental version)

22. Frog Roe At The Boat Show (instrumental version)

23. Gun Powder Blues (3x versions)

24. Rebuilding

25. Sad Emotions

26. Short Guitar Loop

27. The Good, The Great & The Grand

28. The Widow's Lament


DYNAMIC MUSIC:

Buffalo Stampede - 5x Stems

The Hunt - 11x Stems


STINGERS:

1. Whistle & Guitar

2. Snare & Bell (B, D, E & F#)

3. Snare

4. Jew Harp

5. Rattle

6. "Hargh"

7. Guitar Shimmer
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 59

Number of Audio Cues: 59

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 119 minutes (including stems)

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All

Documentation: None required

Important/Additional Notes:

Because of the musical nature of the stingers, Stinger 2 has been provided as 5 different notes in order to match the varying musical keys of the original looping tracks.

The Hunt has been arranged into three levels of intensity, A B and C, each with their own stems.

releaseInfo.releaseNote: V 1.5 - 45 Minutes of New Audio Added!!
